contentrichtext.text: {| class="wikitable collapsible" align="right" style="margin: 1em; margin-top: 0; font-size:89%" ! colspan="2" style="white-space: nowrap;" | [[Asteroid]]s discovered: 7 |- | [[11118 Modra]]{{ref label|codisc|1|}} || August 9, 1996 |- | [[15860 Siráň]]{{ref label|codisc|1|}} || April 20, 1996 |- | [[24194 Paľuš]]{{ref label|codisc|1|}} || December 8, 1999 |- | [[38238 Holíč]]{{ref label|codisc|2|}} || July 18, 1999 |- | [[48934 Kočanová]]{{ref label|codisc|3|}} || August 18, 1998 |- | [[53910 Jánfischer]]{{ref label|codisc|4|}} || April 6, 2000 |- | [[(118366) 1999 GK]]{{ref label|codisc|5|}} || April 5, 1999 |- | colspan="2" style="font-size: smaller;" | # {{note label|codisc|1|}} with [[Adrián Galád|A. Galád]] # {{note label|codisc|2|}} with [[Štefan Gajdoš|Š. Gajdoš]] # {{note label|codisc|3|}} with [[Alexander Pravda|A. Pravda]] # {{note label|codisc|4|}} with [[Leonard Kornoš|L. Kornoš]] # {{note label|codisc|5|}} with [[Juraj Tóth|J. Tóth]] |} '''Dušan Kalmančok''' (born 1945) is a [[Slovakia|Slovak]] [[astronomer]]. He has discovered a number of [[asteroid]]s. According to the citation for an asteroid named after him, 29824 Kalmancok, "He significantly contributed to building the [[Comenius University]] [http://www.daa.fmph.uniba.sk Astronomical and Geophysical Observatory in] [[Modra]]. He participated in the development of observational programs for studying interplanetary matter and the [[Sun]]." ==External links== * [http://ssd.jpl.nasa.gov/sbdb.cgi?sstr=29824 Page for Asteroid 29824 Kalmancok] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Kalmancok, Dusan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1945 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kalmancok, Dusan}} [[Category:1945 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Slovak astronomers]] [[Category:Discoverers of asteroids]] {{Slovakia-scientist-stub}} {{Europe-astronomer-stub}}
